snippet: Emma Stone, Rooney Mara and Keira Knightley were all inspired to leave calf-skimming coats unbuttoned over their dresses.
abstract: Emma Stone, Rooney Mara and Keira Knightley were all inspired to leave calf-skimming coats unbuttoned over their dresses.
lead_paragraph: Last week's freeze out transitioned into a springlike weekend, inspiring women to leave calf-skimming coats unbuttoned over their dresses. Here, the actress Rooney Mara wears a robelike piece in all black; the actress Emma Stone embraces winter white in a double-breasted trench with extra-large lapels; and the actress Keira Knightley chooses a long, ladylike take on the peacoat to pair with lace.
